mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS (USER_UID, NAME, PASSWORD, E_MAIL, BIRTH_DATE, POSTALCODE, ADDRESS, DETAILADDRESS, EXTRAADDRESS, JOINDATE, PHONE, MARKETING_RECEIVE_ACCEPTION, GRADE_UID, AUTH_UID) VALUE ( #{USER_UID}, #{NAME}, #{PASSWORD}, #{E_MAIL}, #{BIRTH_DATE}, #{POSTALCODE}, #{ADDRESS}, #{DETAILADDRESS}, #{EXTRAADDRESS}, sysdate(), CONCAT (#{phoneFirst},#{phoneSecond},#{phoneThird}), 'N', #{GRADE_UID}, 'AUTH_U');
